name: SMASH N' GRAB
description:
The plan is simple.

Get into the museum, walk to the priced diamond at the back of the building, and steal it! Problem is, however, that the museum guards are sure to come for you as soon as you steal the diamond.

Smash it and grab it!

Developers: 

Art and Music
3D-Artist Weapons - Sebastian Bertzell
3D-Artist Props - Lisa Karlsson
3D-Artist Map and Environment - Alexander Pernebring
3D-Artist Player and Enemies - Michel Poline
2D-Artist Logo - Oliver Benedetti Yu 

Design
Weapon System Programmer - Gustav Eriksson
Player Movement Programmer / UI programmer - Isabelle Höljer Heiskanen
UI Programmer - Slvyatoslav Lapshin
Sound Design and Implementation - John Lundström
Level Designer - Ben Schelhaas
AI Programmer - Tiger Sjöman Martin
